## 1. Grouping Script Test

This document tests that the "apprehensions_origins" dataset was downloaded correctly.

### 1.1 One test file

```{r, echo = TRUE}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)

df <- read_csv("../data/apprehensions_origins/Family Units apprehended along the SWB FY2000 Redacted_raw.xlsx.csv.gz_2.csv.gz")
df %>% head(5)
```

Looks good.
